issue.title: [Rust] Simplify code for impl PrimitiveArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10424](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10424). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the end of specialization, there is now a simpler way of writing the generics for PrimitiveArrays.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10424?focusedCommentId=17224946) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
